title: Fix clickable issue titles in edit view
description: Added support for clicking on issue titles in the edit view (sub-issues and dependencies) to open them in new edit views
notes: Added support for clicking on issue titles in the edit view (sub-issues and dependencies) to open them in new edit views in the same docking group instead of split windows. Also improved tab titles to show 'Issue Title (#ID)' for better identification when multiple tabs are open.
